title: Ciena returns to S&P 500 after getting booted 17 years ago
description: Ciena is predicting the fastest growth since 2011 in the current fiscal year, thanks to its position in artificial intelligence.
content:
Networking hardware maker Ciena will join the S&P 500, returning to the benchmark after getting booted 17 years ago. The stock rose in extended trading.
